name: Beware Of The Spiders
description:
This is for LudumDare #37 - OneRoom

In this game you are a cat and you have to defend the child of incoming spider hordes. For each spider you kill, the score multiplier will rise. If a spider reaches the kid, the multiplier will be resetted. The kid can take 10 Spider attacks before it will run away.

Controls:

  • W,A,S,D or ArrowKeys to move
  • Space bar for melee attack

Here you can play the HTML-Version
